images.caption: Figure 1:The evolution of AI efficiency: from model-centric to data-centric compression.From 2022 to 2024, AI model performance gains mainly came from scalingmodel size, directing efficiency research towardsmodel-centric compression. By mid-2024, with model sizes approaching 1000B parameters, their growth hasslowed down. Consequently, the focus has shifted toexpandingcontext lengthto further enhance model capabilities. This paradigm shift necessitates a transition todata-centric compression, emphasizing context length reduction for model efficiency.
